loan.name: Bonderley
loan.use: to buy fertilizer and to de-weed his coffee farm.
loan.description:
Bonderley lives in Caserío Peringos, a community of coffee growers at an average of San Ignacio, Peru.

He is 28 years old and lives with his wife who is 23 years old, together they have two young children. They look after a 2 hectare plot, which produces excellent coffee Since a young age, his parents taught him how to farm. He no dreams of increasing his production and earning more income.

A loan to Bonderley will give him the opportunity to improve his business, by increasing production fertilization and weeding, which will improve the quality of coffee. eventually he will be able to earn more money from this next harvest.
loan.whySpecial: It supports lucrative and sustainable livelihoods for organic farmers.
loan.partnerName: Cooperativa de Ahorro y Crédito Norandino
